title: 13-year-old accidentally shoots himself in the foot
content:
WAITSFIELD, Vt. -
A 13-year-old boy is recovering after he accidentally shot himself in the foot while hunting.
Vermont State Police say it happened Wednesday just after 4 p.m. in Waitsfield. Members of the Vermont State Police Uniform Division, the Bureau of Criminal Investigation Unit, and the Vermont Department of Fish and Wildlife responded to investigate the incident.
Police say the boy accidentally discharged a small caliber gun and the bullet hit his left foot. He was transported to the UVM Medical Center for treatment.
